id: Exposed: Right-wing conspiracy theorist’s plot to smear Mueller unravels
paragraph: New York Times’ Michael Schmidt, former U.S. Attorney Joyce Vance, Washington Post’s Phil Rucker, Daily Beast’s Sam Stein and Betsy Woodruff on the exposed plot to smear special counsel Robert Mueller with sexual misconduct allegationsOct. 30, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
